text: <@UP79BQ7AP> yeah dude. This is pretty dope. Right now I am just using hubl tags, but it would be great if the mjml blocks were modules, not just include snippets. if you have a build process for this, please share Something I can't quite wrap my head around how that might work at the moment

thank you AJ. Yes different office locations. And also some authors have been adding text to suit their needs like an email signature of sorts. To get it to display how they want it to look not understanding the global impact of the change.
But your first answer is ok for me... It just means we need to do more education/training on our side. But I think any change to this should require  admin permissions at least.

<@UEC65BQV8> Anything that has a repeater in it I refactor into a module. I don't have a special workflow outside of copy/pasting the right areas, but it's worked well for me. One serious limitation is that the CSS is decoupled from the module, and there's no way to use {% require_css %} in email modules either, so you may have unused CSS in your head :confused:
